Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ekuwalulamiseni Senza iinqwelo zawo zorhwebo ziphume ebusika nasehlotyeni
Ngoko ke makanqule iNkosi yalo Mzi
Abanqwenela ukubonwa (ngabantu xa besenza izenzo zabo zonqulo)
Ngoko ke thandaza eNkosini yakho, unikele (amadini) kuYo
Inene lowo ukuchasileyo nguye oza kunqanyulwa (angabikho alityalwe)
